model_id: PIXMA G1000 - Refillable Ink Tank Printer
title: PIXMA G1000 - Refillable Ink Tank Printer
summary: Introducing Refillable Ink Tank SystemCanon's first refillable ink tank printer is designed for high volume printing at low running cost.PrintISO Standard print speed (A4): up to 8.8ipm (mono) / 5.0ipm (colour)Prints a 4 x 6” borderless photo in 60secs.
